segments.text: Excuse me , sir , this is the express check-out lane for people that have fifteen items or fewer . It looks like you have more than fifteen items there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , come on ! I have sixteen items ! Cut me some slack , will ya ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! Please place your items on the belt and push your shopping cart through . Do you prefer paper or plastic ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Plastic . I also have a couple of coupons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , I ’ ll take those . Sir , these coupons expired yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Darn ! Oh , well . I guess it ’ s just not my day . Thanks anyway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a club card or will it be cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah I got a club card . Here you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will this be debit or credit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Debit please . Also , could I get cash back ? Fifty dollars would be great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , sure . Your total is seventy-eight dollars and thirty-three cents . Here is your receipt . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S1
